review: I had mixed experiences with Kustom - Tucson. On one hand, they were responsive and quick to start the job, which is a plus. However, the quality of their work left much to be desired, and communication was often lacking. I also encountered some unprofessional behavior from the staff, which was disappointing. Overall, while they may be a good option for emergencies, I would be cautious and consider other options for more critical work.
